definitions: in a distrustful way that expresses a belief that people are motivated purely by self-interest

examples.text: many cynically dismiss the way of peace as naive and impossible

definitions: in a way that expresses doubt as to whether something will happen or whether it is worthwhile

examples.text: the public has cynically disregarded the good news

shortDefinitions: in way that expresses doubt as to whether something will happen or whether it is worthwhile

definitions: in a way that is concerned only with one's own interests and disregards accepted standards in order to achieve them

examples.text: he was accused of cynically exploiting a terrible tragedy

shortDefinitions: in way that is concerned only with one's own interests
